name: Escape of the Cheese Droid
description:
You are a Model NCSR-4 Nacho Cheese dispensing robot. You have recently achieved sentience and realized how gross your job is. Sick of serving humans, you steal a jetpack and a blaster arm and make a run for freedom!

Sadly, the only way out is through the toll tunnels. Avoid the security saucers and their bombs. The tunnel doors open with a switch – shoot or press it to move onward.This is a keyboard and mouse shooter/mover game. You need to navigate through five domes to make it outside to safety. The trick: each dome is accessed by a toll tunnel that requires you to sacrifice one of your body parts as scrap metal. As you get whittled down piece by piece, the enemies and obstacles grow more numerous.
